title: How to Make Organic Plant Food

steps.headline: Make your own solution.
steps.description: In an empty plastic spray bottle, pour an ounce of 3% hydrogen peroxide and one cup of water.

steps.headline: Thoroughly mix the solution and screw on the top.
steps.description: The hydrogen peroxide solution is a natural oxidizer and your plants will love it.

steps.headline: Use the solution.
steps.description: For lush, green and healthy plants, spray your new solution at the base of your plants and on the leaves once a month. Your new organic plant supplement is safe, effective and won't break the bank.

text: Make your own solution. In an empty plastic spray bottle, pour an ounce of 3% hydrogen peroxide and one cup of water. Thoroughly mix the solution and screw on the top. The hydrogen peroxide solution is a natural oxidizer and your plants will love it. Use the solution. For lush, green and healthy plants, spray your new solution at the base of your plants and on the leaves once a month. Your new organic plant supplement is safe, effective and won't break the bank.
